description: Data was extracted from GDC in {---tag-release-month-year---}. This table contains information regarding the relationship between the Cancer Gene Census, COSMIC ID, Gene Name, HGNC ID, and Entrez ID.

fields.name: Mutated
fields.description: Does the gene have coding mutations? yes or no

fields.name: Cancer_census
fields.description: Is the gene in the Cancer gene census? yes or no.

fields.name: Expert_Curated
fields.description: Has the gene been manually curated by the team of expert curators? yes or no
